item.title: Razer Blade 15 Advanced Hackintosh Resources
item.description: Main Clover Guide to follow â€“ STONEVIL_GUIDE https://github.com/stonevil/Razer_Blade_Advanced_early_2019_Hackintosh OpenCore Guide for 9th gen coffee lake CPUs https://khronokernel.github.io/Opencore-Vanilla-Laptop-Guide/config.plist/coffee-lake-9th-gen.html Reference - Reddit post URL (https://www.reddit.com/r/hackintosh/comments/dzrunr/razer_blade_advanced_mid_2019_macbook_pro/) Get his EFI and Extensions for validation. EFI link - https://mega.nz/file/xoZiDYjY#rD3FC57Qziq0Hf7CzBgI8EbBejskUS7EeFPWix1nRwk Extensions link - https://mega.nz/file/cpQnSKqR#1uC8ZT-6isHS7fi0gLhz4TjlNaXuHcP2aAPyBK0OTzw
